definition.title: Generalized Poisson Random Field (GPRF)
definition.content: $\{M(A), A \in \mathcal{A}_d\}$: Non-negative integer-valued measure with independent increments, where for $A \in \mathcal{A}_d$: $$ \mathrm{Pr}\{M(A) = n\} = \sum_{\Theta(k,n)} \prod_{j=1}^k \frac{(\lambda_j |A|)^{n_j}}{n_j!} e^{-\lambda_j |A|}, \quad \Theta(k,n) = \left\{(n_1, \dots, n_k) \in \mathbb{N}_0^k : \sum_{j=1}^k j n_j = n\right\}. $$
definition.impact: Generalizes Poisson counts by allowing batch arrivals (size $\leq k$) in infinitesimal regions.

definition.title: Fractional GPRF (FGPRF)
definition.content: $\{M^{\alpha,\beta}(s,t)\}$: Time-changed GPRF on $\mathbb{R}^2_+$: $$ M^{\alpha,\beta}(s,t) = M(L^\alpha(s), L^\beta(t)), \quad 0 < \alpha, \beta \leq 1, $$ where $L^\alpha, L^\beta$ are independent inverse $\alpha$- and $\beta$-stable subordinators.
definition.impact: Introduces memory via inverse subordinators, capturing subdiffusive spatial dynamics.

definition.title: Generalized Skellam Point Process (GSPP)
definition.content: $\{S(A)\}$: For finite $\mathcal{I} \subset \mathbb{R} \setminus \{0\}$ and independent GPRFs $\{M_i(A)\}$, $$ S(A) = \sum_{i \in \mathcal{I}} i M_i(A). $$
definition.impact: Constructs signed measures from independent GPRFs.

theorem.title: GPRF Representation
theorem.content: Every GPRF satisfies $M(A) \overset{d}{=} \sum_{j=1}^k j N_j(A)$, where $\{N_j(A)\}$ are independent PRFs with rates $\lambda_j$.
theorem.impact: Enables tractable analysis via decomposition into independent PRFs.

theorem.title: FGPRF Distribution
theorem.content: The state probabilities $p^{\alpha,\beta}(n,s,t)$ of FGPRF solve: $$ \frac{\partial^{\alpha+\beta}}{\partial t^\beta \partial s^\alpha} p^{\alpha,\beta}(n,s,t) = -\sum_{j=1}^k \lambda_j (I - B^j) \left(1 + \sum_{j'=1}^k \lambda_{j'} \sum_{r=1}^{j'} B^{j'-r} \frac{\partial}{\partial \lambda_1}\right) p^{\alpha,\beta}(n,s,t), $$ with explicit solution involving generalized Wright functions.
theorem.impact: Provides fractional analog governing anomalous diffusion.

proposition.title: GSPP Representation
proposition.content: $S(A) \overset{d}{=} \sum_{r=1}^{N(A)} X_r Y_r$, where $\{N(A)\}$ is a PRF and $\{(X_r, Y_r)\}$ are iid jumps.
proposition.impact: Connects GSPP to compound Poisson processes.

dissatisfaction.title: Dimensionality Constraint
dissatisfaction.desired_behavior: Extension to $\mathbb{R}^d_+$ for $d \geq 3$ with non-rectangular increments.
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Proofs rely on rectangular increments; higher dimensions require non-trivial generalization.

dissatisfaction.title: Fractional Order Limitation
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Non-locality of Caputo derivatives breaks current proof techniques when $\alpha + \beta > 1$.

dissatisfaction.title: Independent Subordinators Requirement
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Correlated subordinators break current proofs which assume independence.

dissatisfaction.title: Integral Type Ambiguity
dissatisfaction.desired_behavior: Clarify Itô vs. Stratonovich integrals for path integrals of GPRF.
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Current framework does not specify integral interpretation for path integrals.

dissatisfaction.title: Missing Space-Fractional Analogs
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Conjectured but not proven in current work.

example.title: FGPRF Variance Growth
example.lesson: Dependence on $\alpha, \beta$ is sharp and cannot be improved under current assumptions.

raised_conjecture.title: Higher Dimensional Extension
raised_conjecture.content: Extend GPRF/FGPRF to $\mathbb{R}^d_+$ for $d \geq 3$ with non-rectangular increments.
raised_conjecture.impact: Would significantly broaden applicability to real-world datasets.

raised_conjecture.title: Dependent Subordinators Analysis
raised_conjecture.heuristic: More realistic for systems with coupled temporal dynamics.
raised_conjecture.impact: Enable modeling of spatially correlated anomalous diffusion.

raised_conjecture.title: Alternative Fractional Operators
raised_conjecture.content: Replace Caputo with Atangana-Baleanu or Prabhakar derivatives.
raised_conjecture.heuristic: These operators may capture different memory effects.
raised_conjecture.impact: Could lead to new classes of fractional spatial processes.

raised_conjecture.title: Sample Path Properties
raised_conjecture.content: Study Hölder continuity, Hausdorff dimension for FGPRF/GSPP.
raised_conjecture.impact: Critical for applications requiring path regularity.

raised_conjecture.title: Statistical Inference Methods
raised_conjecture.content: Develop parameter estimation for FGPRF rates $\lambda_j$ and $\alpha, \beta$.
raised_conjecture.heuristic: Necessary for practical adoption in spatial statistics.
raised_conjecture.impact: Enable empirical validation and application to real data.

raised_conjecture.title: Generalized Skellam Extension
raised_conjecture.content: Extend GSPP to infinite $\mathcal{I}$ or Lévy bases.
raised_conjecture.heuristic: Natural progression for modeling complex signed measures.
raised_conjecture.impact: Would unify with Lévy process theory.
